greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle in which n-th row is binomial(n+k-1,k), for column k=1..n.
program: (PARI) tabl(nn) = {for (n=1, nn, for (k=1, n, print1( binomial(n+k-1, k), ", ");); print(););} \\ _Michel Marcus_, Jun 12 2013
xref: A059481 with the first column (k = 0) removed.
results.author: Daniel McLaury (daniel.mclaury(AT)gmail.com), Sep 11 2009
